channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree needs pruning, 28th August
item.description:
Has been reported multiple times over the period of a year with no action taken. Tree continues to grow into road scratching parked cars and blocking visibility for drivers near a corner

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hargwyne Street, Stockwell, London

item.title: Litter left by drug-users, 28th August
item.description:
On Wednesday the 27th of August a bunch of people coming in and out two vehicles parked here openly consumed drugs starting from around 2pm till they left at around 9.30pm. They left litter in the area they were stationary.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Littlestone Close, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover collapsed, 28th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark Bridge Road, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: They’re Dumping Building Rubble now, 28th August
item.description:
Dumped in tree area off of footpath. Peabody, you really need to crack down on this now. The volume of rubbish being dumped in this small area alone must be costing you a fortune to keep clearing these fly tips. What next, dead bodies because it’s cheaper and easier than arranging a funeral. CCTV has to be the only answer.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Campion Place, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
